channel.title: Case?
channel.description:
[code]case 72: // Wheat owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You get some grain"); owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(29, 1)); break;[/code]
Can anyone explain what the "Case 72:" is, and how I can get the case for another OBJECT that I would like to to add objectAction.java
Nvm I just noticed that it is the ID of the object in the GameObjectDef.xml
Would appreciate if someone locked this, thanks.
